name: Frame Organizer Kit
description:
Keep your artboards organized and easy to navigate for you and your developers with this kit, including:


Section titles

Group and name your flows and features


Frame titles

Name and describe what’s going on in each frame


Platform tags

Tag your flows to make it easy to separate Android or iOS screens, or different screen sizes for web


Status tags

Set status for each screen or flow to make it easy to see what’s done and what’s not


Comments

Make notes on spesific parts of your screens
